title: get rewarded for your tanking
body:
Need a tank that abilities scale with damage they have absorbed

A second resource bar like mana?

An ultimate which heals incoming damage / deflects it

replies.body:
Here's what they should do;
Gromp's Smite Buff currently deals 10% of your bonus health over 3 seconds to enemies that attack you. With certain champions, this is decently powerful, but can only be accessed temporarily.
They should bump that off, and give the effect to the new Cinderhulk enchantment, but with less % HP scaling. (I'm thinking 6%).
Gives tanks clear, gives them a reason to take damage, rewards them for being disruptive to the enemy team (the more they focus you, the higher your impact is), and lets them deal meaningful AoE damage but not to an oppressive level. Unless you're Sion.
